S.FORM: == Cirarokohay == u sulit nu Hulam: 芝田部落 tina niyazu' itiza i Taitung sian Chenkung cen Sansian li. naayaway a ngangan sa u Cirarokohay sananay. Cirarokohay raroko", Sayiat","Ciokakai","Vitoror Panifong"氏族與馬武窟的"Fafokod"氏族為卑南阿美. u siwkay nu niyzau' i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Cirarokohay. u kasalumaluma' nu Cirarokohay sa, 213 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 575 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 408 ku tademaw, pakalatu 71%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 167 ku tademaw, pakalatu 29%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 68%, Rukay(Rukai) 1%, zumazuma 2%. tabakiay a niyazu' kuyni, duut ku tademaw, duut ku Pangcah(Amis) a tademaw. u Taitung sa u Pusung hananay nu Sakizaya a kamu, i sawaliyna-timul nu Taywan sabal. caykaw nu Sakizayaay a niyazu', u Pangcah(Amis) a niyazu' kuyni. u Pangcah(Amis) sananay, katalakaw ku uzip, matineng miadup atu mibuting. u Incumin a tademaw tu, u Pangcah(Amis) a cidekay duut ku tademaw. matineng mudadiw atu musalukiyaw ku Pangcah(Amis) . u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin sananay, u saayaway a muenengay a tademaw itini, itini uyiniyan a subal. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu,sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangbulanay. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 12 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Cirarokohay == o solit no Holam: 芝田部落 tina niyazo' itiza i Taitong sian Chenkong cen Sansian li. naayaway a ngangan sa o Cirarokohay sananay. Cirarokohay raroko", Sayiat","Ciokakai","Vitoror Panifong"氏族與馬武窟的"Fafokod"氏族為卑南阿美. o siwkay no niyzao' i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Cirarokohay. o kasalomaloma' no Cirarokohay sa, 213 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 575 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 408 ko tademaw, pakalato 71%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 167 ko tademaw, pakalato 29%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 68%, Rokay(Rokai) 1%, zomazoma 2%. tabakiay a niyazo' koyni, doot ko tademaw, doot ko Pangcah(Amis) a tademaw. o Taitong sa o Posong hananay no Sakizaya a kamo, i sawaliyna-timol no Taywan sabal. caykaw no Sakizayaay a niyazo', o Pangcah(Amis) a niyazo' koyni. o Pangcah(Amis) sananay, katalakaw ko ozip, matineng miadop ato miboting. o Incomin a tademaw to, o Pangcah(Amis) a cidekay doot ko tademaw. matineng modadiw ato mosalokiyaw ko Pangcah(Amis) . o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin sananay, o saayaway a moenengay a tademaw itini, itini oyiniyan a sobal. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco,sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangbolanay. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 12 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
